title: Night Shift Witch
description: A witch, a wizard, and a human walk into a funeral home...Except the punchline to this story is murder. Less than a day on the job at the funeral home, and Star discovers one of their accidental death clients didn't die accidentally. Before she knows it, she's neck-deep in a murder mystery.Join Star, her ex-boyfriend, and her new boss as they untangle magical motives, methods, and means.
author: Cate Lawley
